  • Constructor Details

    • Button

      public Button(String text, zombie.ui.UIFont font, int posX, int posY, int width, int height, float r, float g, float b, float a)
      Creates a button with the specified location and color options
      Parameters:
      text - text displayed on the button
      font - font of the text displayed on the button
      posX - the horizontal X coordinate of the button's top left corner
      posY - the vertical Y coordinate of the top left corner of the button
      width - the width of the button in pixels
      height - the height of the button in pixels
      r - red component of the color, value from 0.0 to 1.0
      g - green component of the color, value from 0.0 to 1.0
      b - blue component of the color, value from 0.0 to 1.0
      a - the alpha component for transparency, a value from 0.0 (fully transparent) to 1.0 (fully opaque)
